catalog_info.title: Corporate Finance
catalog_info.notes: Tu., Th., 1-2:30, and a weekly section to be arranged.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Economics 1010a1, 1010a2, or 1011a, Mathematics 20, and Statistics 100.
catalog_info.description: Introduction to corporate finance, including capital budgeting, capital structure of firms, dividend policy, corporate governance, and takeovers. Prerequisites for this course include Economics 1010a1, 1010a2, or 1011a, Mathematics 20, and Statistics 100.
